snippet: The Wildcats became the 20th defending national champions to be left out of the N.C.A.A. tournament, and the Crimson Tide joined them as the NIT’s other No. 1 seed.
abstract: Kentucky and Alabama are No. 1 seeds in men's college basketball's National Invitation Tournament.
lead_paragraph: The Wildcats became the 20th defending national champions to be left out of the N.C.A.A. tournament, and the Crimson Tide joined them as the NIT’s other No. 1 seed.

headline.seo: Kentucky and Alabama Top Seeds in N.I.T.
headline.main: Kentucky and Alabama Top N.I.T. Field
